column4: What is "add yourselves to the "lp" group" ? what does it mean ?
your user is a member of many groups, you can add / remove yourself from them as you need
: how do I do that ? sorry new to ubuntu
: having problem in virutalbox usb grey out , said it's the group problem but I dont know how to slove
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/AddUsersHowto
: still my usb grey out on vrtualbox
are  you using the closed source version?
: how do i check ?
what is the output of: dpkg -l | grep -i virtualbox
use http://pastie.org   if it is multilined
: ii  virtualbox-3.2      3.2.10-66523~Ubuntu~maverick         Oracle VM VirtualBox
: what does it mean ?
have you asked in #vbox?
: they just told me is permission issue but didn't reply after that
: any help ?
thats all I got, i dont use virtualization
: oh , anyway thanks for tell :) gtg then will asked in vbox tomorrow :)
: thanks :)
mac isn't supported here
sounds like a ripoff of rsync
there is grsync as a GUI for it

jrib : Really sorry for the late reply , was away just now .The feature I wanted is just to preserve the modified time when transfering files.If I use mv in command line , the modified time for a folder is preserve.But when I use cut and paste fora folder , the modified time get updated.Only happen on Folder moving ntfs partition
